name: diagnosis_impotence
description: Medical condition characterized as a failure of a body part for which diagnosis and treatment require medical expertise.

name: procedure_penile_prosthesis_implantation
description: Surgical treatment for impotence involving the implantation of a penile prosthesis.

name: coverage_sexual_impotence_diagnosis_treatment
description: Indicates whether program payment is made for diagnosis and treatment of sexual impotence.

name: documentation_appropriateness_suspicion_of_abuse
description: Flag indicating if documentation of appropriateness is required due to suspected abuse in individual cases.

name: patient_status_hospital_inpatient
description: Indicates whether the patient is a hospital inpatient.

name: patient_condition_mental
description: Indicates whether the patient's condition is connected to a mental condition.

name: limitation_psychiatric_service
description: Indicates if the psychiatric service limitation described in the Medicare General Information, Eligibility, and Entitlement Manual, Chapter 3, applies.
